mapper.select: SELECT event_article_num, subject, textcontent, eventType, thumbnail, TO_CHAR(startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startdate , TO_CHAR(enddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') enddate FROM event_article

SELECT er.event_article_num, subject, textcontent, eventType, thumbnail, TO_CHAR(startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startdate, TO_CHAR(enddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') enddate
FROM event_article er LEFT OUTER JOIN coupon c ON er.event_article_num = c.event_article_num LEFT OUTER JOIN clockin_event ce ON ce.event_article_num = er.event_article_num WHERE er.event_article_num = #{eventNum}
SELECT CASE WHEN cnt = 1 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS is_valid FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM USER_HAVE_COUPON WHERE memberidx = #{memberidx} and couponcode = #{coupon_code} )
SELECT coupon_code, couponname, valid, rate, TO_CHAR(couponstart,'YYYY-MM-DD') couponstart, TO_CHAR(expiredate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') expiredate FROM coupon WHERE coupon_code = #{coupon_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clockin_log (log_num, event_article_num, memberidx, clockindate) VALUES ( SEQ_CLOCKIN_LOG.NEXTVAL , #{num}, #{memberidx}, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO point_save (POINT_SAVE_NUM, memberidx, saveamount, savedate, expiredate, reason, enable, balance ) VALUES ( SEQ_POINT_SAVE.NEXTVAL, #{memberIdx}, #{saveAmount}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE+365, #{reason}, '0', #{balance})
INSERT INTO user_have_coupon (usercoupon_num, memberidx, couponcode, getdate, expiredate, valid ) VALUES (SEQ_USER_HAVE_COUPON.NEXTVAL, #{memberidx}, #{couponcode}, SYSDATE, #{expiredate}, 0)
